snippet.title: Save Santa Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello guys, I'm glad you are here!

Save Santa is a 3D platformer that puts you in the mood for Christmas but at the same time offers you some challenges that you will have fun with.
Wishlist the game on Steam and download the demo to have a taste of the game.Hope you will enjoy it.
Please feel free to comment with any criticism that can help improve the game.
Thank you!

STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2159040/Save_Santa
ITCH.IO LINK: https://trinnky.itch.io/savesanta
